A second portion of the 5th grade GLC evening culminating event on March 26th will be Instant Team Challenges. During the competition, students will receive the directions and materials to a challenge and have a short time (less than 10 minutes) to develop and execute a plan to solve the problem presented in the challenge. Fantastic work by our GLC teams! #WCconnects
